title: M&M looks to drive into South East Asia market, ramp up in South Africa
description: Mahindra & Mahindra, holding a 51% share in India's pick-up truck market, plans to introduce its Veero range in Southeast Asia and expand in South Africa. Initially focusing on the domestic market, the Veero targets intracity applications and competes with Tata Motors' Intra and Ashok Leyland's Dost models.
